headline.print_headline: Sands: Hacking Went Further Than Email, Websites
headline.main: Sands: Hacking Went Further Than Email, Websites

docs.snippet: Casino giant Las Vegas Sands Corp. said Tuesday that hacking into their websites and internal systems last week went deeper than the company had previously known....
docs.lead_paragraph: Casino giant Las Vegas Sands Corp. said Tuesday that hacking into their websites and internal systems last week went deeper than the company had previously known.

headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did
headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did

docs.snippet: Stocks closed mostly higher Tuesday as traders got back to work after a long holiday weekend. Health care stocks rose more than the rest of the market after pharmaceutical company Actavis said it was buying rival Forest Laboratories for $25 billio...
docs.lead_paragraph: Stocks closed mostly higher Tuesday as traders got back to work after a long holiday weekend. Health care stocks rose more than the rest of the market after pharmaceutical company Actavis said it was buying rival Forest Laboratories for $25 billion in cash and stock. The Dow was held back by a decline in Coca-Cola, which reported disappointing fourth-quarter results.

headline.sub: White House urges Yanukovich to "deescalate immediately" situation in Ukraine
headline.main: White House urges Yanukovich to "deescalate immediately" situation in Ukraine

docs.snippet: The White House says it is "appalled" by violence in the streets of Ukraine and calls on Ukrainian President Viktor Yanukovich to "deescalate immediately the situation and end the confrontation." Rough Cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House says it is "appalled" by violence in the streets of Ukraine and calls on Ukrainian President Viktor Yanukovich to "deescalate immediately the situation and end the confrontation." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: Capital One to Revisit Credit Card Contract Terms After Outcry

docs.snippet: The company said it would rethink the wording of its credit card contracts after a provision that said the bank could “contact you at your home and at your place of employment” began attracting a lot of unwanted attention....

keywords.value: Credit Card Accountability, Responsibility and Disclosu
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: The company said it would rethink the wording of its credit card contracts after a provision that said the bank could “contact you at your home and at your place of employment” began attracting a lot of unwanted attention.

headline.print_headline: Mexico Arrests Alleged Drug Cartel Financier
headline.main: Mexico Arrests Alleged Drug Cartel Financier

docs.snippet: Mexican federal police say they have arrested a man they believe is a high-level financial operator for the Knights Templar drug cartel....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican federal police say they have arrested a man they believe is a high-level financial operator for the Knights Templar drug cartel.

headline.print_headline: El Salvador Castaway Vows Will Not Return to Sea
headline.main: El Salvador Castaway Vows Will Not Return to Sea

docs.snippet: A fisherman from El Salvador who says he spent 13 months adrift in the Pacific Ocean, surviving on turtle blood and fish and birds caught with his bare hands, vowed he would not venture back out to sea as he left hospital on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A fisherman from El Salvador who says he spent 13 months adrift in the Pacific Ocean, surviving on turtle blood and fish and birds caught with his bare hands, vowed he would not venture back out to sea as he left hospital on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Tax Season Returns, and With It Refund Fraud
headline.main: U.S. Tax Season Returns, and With It Refund Fraud

docs.snippet: Kev Imandoust guards his U.S. Social Security number with 25-character passwords and email encryption software. But in 2012, the San Diego accountant became one of more than a million Americans whose identities were stolen to use for tax refund fr...
docs.lead_paragraph: Kev Imandoust guards his U.S. Social Security number with 25-character passwords and email encryption software. But in 2012, the San Diego accountant became one of more than a million Americans whose identities were stolen to use for tax refund fraud.

headline.print_headline: Cochran Says He Doesn't Know Much About Tea Party
headline.main: Cochran Says He Doesn't Know Much About Tea Party

docs.snippet: Veteran Republican Sen. Thad Cochran of Mississippi says he's not familiar with the tea party, even though he's being challenged by a supporter of the populist movement....
docs.lead_paragraph: Veteran Republican Sen. Thad Cochran of Mississippi says he's not familiar with the tea party, even though he's being challenged by a supporter of the populist movement.

headline.print_headline: Fed Toughens Rules for Large Foreign Banks
headline.main: Fed Toughens Rules for Large Foreign Banks

docs.snippet: The Federal Reserve will require the largest foreign banks operating in the United States to hold higher levels of capital reserves to protect against potential loan losses....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve will require the largest foreign banks operating in the United States to hold higher levels of capital reserves to protect against potential loan losses.

headline.print_headline: Away Wins for Barca and PSG in Champions League Last 16
headline.main: Away Wins for Barca and PSG in Champions League Last 16
